appDesc.description: A description of what the application does. This extension is used to...
appDesc.message: Quickly resolve digital object identifiers to their web destinations

autolinkExclusionsInvalidUrl.description: Report that test URL is invalid due to missing http/https protocol

autolinkExclusionsMatch.description: Confirm that a URL is matched by one of the autolink exclusions

autolinkExclusionsNoMatch.description: Report that no match was found for the URL against the autolink exclusions

citeHeading.description: The title on the citation generator page

citeLocaleLabel.description: A label next to the locale chooser for formatted citations

citeLocaleLoadFail.description: Failure message when locale.xml retrieval fails (HTML anchor to github.com/citation-style-language/locales will be inserted at runtime)
citeLocaleLoadFail.message: Could not load locales-$locale$.xml from HTML_SUB_A_CSL_LOCALES(GitHub)

citeStyle.description: A label next to the style chooser for formatted citations

citeStyleFilterLabel.description: The label for the style filter box on the Citations page

citeStyleGenFail.description: General failure message for citation generation

citeStyleLoadFail.description: Failure message when style.csl retrieval fails (HTML anchor to github.com/citation-style-language/styles will be inserted at runtime)
citeStyleLoadFail.message: Could not load style $style$.csl from HTML_SUB_A_CSL_STYLES(GitHub)

citeStyleNotSelected.description: Failure message when user has not selected a CSL style

citeSubHeading.description: Subheading message on the citation generator page
citeSubHeading.message: Generate a formatted citation for a DOI

citeSubmit.description: The text that appears on the button to start the citation generator

closeButton.description: The text for a close button

contextText.description: When a user highlights a DOI on a webpage and right clicks on the highlighted text, this entry appears in the context menu to resolve the DOI

doiInputLabel.description: Label for text input to indicate a DOI should go here

doiOutputUrlExample.description: Label for the currently set resolver URL

filterHistoryLabel.description: Label for a history filter input

headingAutolink.description: Heading on options page for Autolink

headingContextMenu.description: Heading on options page for the Context Menu

headingCustomResolver.description: Heading on options page for the Custom DOI Resolver

headingHistory.description: Heading on options page for History

headingMeta.description: Heading on options page for QR and Citation Features

headingOmnibox.description: Heading on options page for Omnibox

headingSync.description: Heading on options page for Sync

headingTheme.description: Heading on options page for Theme

historyClear.description: Text for a button that clears all DOIs from history that are not marked Save

historyCopyTitle.description: Hover text for history title to inform user about copy to clipboard feature
historyCopyTitle.message: Click title to copy to clipboard

historyExport.description: Text for button that exports DOIs to CSV

historyFetchTitleLabel.description: Text for checkbox that enables title fetch when DOI is recorded
historyFetchTitleLabel.message: Automatically fetch title when a new DOI is recorded

historyImport.description: Text for button that records a list of DOIs to history

historyImportDescription.description: Text content explaining what the history import feature does
historyImportDescription.message: Import a list of DOIs into history. DOIs can be separated by line breaks or commas.

historyImportFailureBody.description: Body text for info modal on history import failure
historyImportFailureBody.message: An error was encountered during import. Some DOIs may not have been recorded.

historyImportFailureTitle.description: Heading text for info modal on history import failure

historyImportModalLabel.description: Heading text for history import modal

historyImportSubmit.description: Text for button that submits a list of DOIs to record in history

historyNoticeText.description: Text on history page to notify user that history is not enabled

historySaveDivider.description: Text to indicate history items that are saved are above the divider and unsaved items are below

historySaveModalBody.description: The message body to display in an info modal for the save feature on the history page
historySaveModalBody.message: Saved DOIs will not be automatically deleted when the history length is exceeded. If the history length would be exceeded by adding a new entry, the oldest non-saved entry is removed.

historySaveModalTitle.description: The heading to display in an info modal for the save feature on the history page

historySavedEntryLabel.description: A word to indicate an entry has been marked for save; label displayed in the history drop-down

historySortByDate.description: Option to sort history by date added

historySortByDoi.description: Option to sort history by DOI

historySortByLabel.description: A label for the history sort-by selector

historySortBySave.description: Option to sort history by save status

historySortByTitle.description: Option to sort history by title

historyTitleRefresh.description: Text for button that fetches missing history entry titles

iconHover.description: The tooltip message displayed to a user when the mouse hovers on the extension's icon

imgPreview.description: Text to indicate a sample output image

invalidDoiAlert.description: A warning presented to user if the DOI code is not valid

invalidDoiTitle.description: The heading to display when a DOI code is not valid

invalidQrSizeAlert.description: A warning presented to user if the QR image size entered is too large or too small

loading.description: A temporary message while resources load

needCitationPerm.description: A notice to the user that additional permissions must be accepted for the citation generator to work
needCitationPerm.message: Citations are retrieved from crossref.org, datacite.org, medra.org, and doi.org. These permissions must be accepted before the generator will function.

noCitationFound.description: A notice to the user that a citation could not be found

omniboxUsage.description: Brief usage instructions for the omnibox feature
omniboxUsage.message: Type keyword HTML_SUB_CODE(doi) followed by a space in the address bar. Then, you can paste a DOI and navigate directly to its web destination.

optionAutolink.description: A setting to enable the extension to scan every page visited by the user and convert DOI codes into clickable links.
optionAutolink.message: Automatically turn DOI codes on web pages into links

optionAutolinkExclusions.description: Label for textbox area to enter exclusions for the autolink feature
optionAutolinkExclusions.message: Exclude URLs and URL patterns from autolink

optionAutolinkExclusionsHelpIcon.description: The aria-label to apply to the help icon for the autolink exclusions feature

optionAutolinkExclusionsModalBody.description: The message body to display in an info modal for the autolink exclusion feature
optionAutolinkExclusionsModalBody.message: List websites – one per line – that should not be parsed by the autolink feature. All matching tests are case-insensitive. Do not specify the protocol; http and https will be assumed.HTML_SUB_BRHTML_SUB_BRHTML_SUB_SPAN_UL(Normal matching): Websites will be matched based on whether the string matches the URL, HTML_SUB_EM(beginning) with the hostname. Wildcards are not supported.HTML_SUB_BRExample: HTML_SUB_CODE(example.com/abc) will match HTML_SUB_CODE(http://example.com/abc/def) but will not match HTML_SUB_CODE(http://www.example.com/abc/def).HTML_SUB_BRHTML_SUB_BRHTML_SUB_SPAN_UL(Regex matching): Surround an entry by forward slashes (HTML_SUB_CODE(/)) to perform a regex match on an entire URL, beginning with the hostname.HTML_SUB_BRExample: HTML_SUB_CODE(/example\.com\/abc.*/) will match both HTML_SUB_CODE(http://example.com/abc/def) and HTML_SUB_CODE(http://www.example.com/abc/def).

optionAutolinkExclusionsModalTitle.description: The heading to display in an info modal for the autolink exclusion feature

optionAutolinkModalBody.description: The message body to display in an info modal for the autolink feature
optionAutolinkModalBody.message: This feature requires permission to access and modify pages you are viewing. You will need to refresh open tabs for this option to take effect.

optionAutolinkModalTitle.description: The heading to display in an info modal for the autolink feature

optionAutolinkPermissionsIcon.description: The aria-label to apply to the permissions icon for the autolink feature

optionAutolinkRewrite.description: A setting to enable the extension to scan every page visited by the user and rewite doi.org and dx.doi.org links to be handled by the custom DOI resolver instead.
optionAutolinkRewrite.message: Rewrite existing doi.org and dx.doi.org links to use the Custom DOI Resolver

optionAutolinkTestExclusion.description: Label for text input to verify whether a URL will be matched by an autolink exclusion

optionContextMatch.description: A setting to enable DOI detection when a user highlights text on a webpage, determining whether to show 'Resolve DOI' in the context menu
optionContextMatch.message: Only show context menu entry if a DOI is selected

optionContextMatchModalBody.description: The message body to display in an info modal for the context menu match feature
optionContextMatchModalBody.message: This feature requires permission to access pages you are viewing and parse selected text. You will need to refresh open tabs for this option to take effect.

optionContextMatchModalTitle.description: The heading to display in an info modal for the context menu match feature

optionContextMatchPermissionsIcon.description: The aria-label to apply to the permissions icon for the context menu match feature
optionContextMatchPermissionsIcon.message: Open context menu selected text permissions notice

optionContextMenu.description: A setting to enable a feature where a user can highlight a DOI on a webpage, and then right click the selected text to see a 'Resolve DOI' in the context menu
optionContextMenu.message: Enable right-click context menu for selected text

optionContextMenuHelpIcon.description: The aria-label to apply to the help icon for the context menu feature

optionContextMenuModalBody.description: The message body text to display in an info modal for the context menu feature
optionContextMenuModalBody.message: This feature adds a 'Resolve DOI' entry in the context menu for selected text.

optionContextMenuModalTitle.description: The heading to display in an info modal for the context menu feature

optionCrAutolink.description: Label to choose whether custom resolver is enabled for autolinker

optionCrBubble.description: Label to choose whether custom resolver is enabled for bubble

optionCrContext.description: Label to choose whether custom resolver is enabled for context menu

optionCrHistory.description: Label to choose whether custom resolver is enabled for history page

optionCrLabelBubble.description: Label for choice of custom or default resolver in bubble

optionCrOmnibox.description: Label to choose whether custom resolver is enabled for omnibox

optionCustomResolver.description: A setting to enable custom entry of DOI and ShortDOI resolvers

optionCustomResolverSelection.description: Settings to allow choice of default or custom resolver

optionHistoryLength.description: Label for history option to retain up to N history entries
optionHistoryLength.message: Number of history entries to retain (1 ≤ N ≤ 5000)

optionHistoryShowSave.description: Label for history option to only show saved items in text box drop-downs
optionHistoryShowSave.message: Only show saved entries in text input box drop-downs

optionHistoryShowTitles.description: Label for history option to show titles instead of DOIs in text box drop-downs
optionHistoryShowTitles.message: Show titles instead of DOIs in text input box drop-downs

optionMetaButtons.description: A setting to enable additional buttons in the browser action bubble
optionMetaButtons.message: Enable additional features in the browser action bubble

optionMetaButtonsHelpIcon.description: The aria-label to apply to the help icon for the additional buttons in the browser action bubble
optionMetaButtonsHelpIcon.message: Open QR and citation features information modal

optionMetaButtonsModalBody.description: The message body text to display in an info modal for the meta buttons feature
optionMetaButtonsModalBody.message: This feature will add buttons to access Options, the Citation Generator, and the QR Code Generator to the browser action bubble.

optionMetaButtonsModalTitle.description: The heading to display in an info modal for the meta buttons feature

optionOmniboxOpento.description: Label for selectable option to open omnibox queries in current or new tab
optionOmniboxOpento.message: Address bar entry should by default open result in:

optionSyncData.message: Synchronize this extension's settings with your profile

optionSyncDataHelpIcon.description: The aria-label to apply to the help icon for the sync feature

optionSyncDataModalBody.description: The message body to display in an info modal for the sync feature
optionSyncDataModalBody.message: You must be logged into your browser and have settings synchronization enabled for this feature to work. This option needs to be enabled on each browser installation where you would like sync to occur. Cross-browser sync (e.g. from Chrome to Firefox) is not yet supported.HTML_SUB_BRHTML_SUB_BRThe following options are not included in sync because they require permissions to be accepted before they can be enabled: HTML_SUB_ULIST(Autolink,QR: Include title of reference in QR code,History: Automatically fetch title when a new DOI is recorded)

optionSyncDataModalTitle.description: The heading to display in an info modal for the sync feature

optionTheme.description: Label for selectable option to choose a dark or light theme

optionsSubmit.description: The text that appears on the button to open the Options page

optionsTabAbout.description: Title for about tab on options page

optionsTabHistory.description: Title for history tab on options page

optionsTabSettings.description: Title for settings tab on options page

qrBgTransLabel.description: The label for the transparent background check box on the QR page

qrBorderInputLabel.description: A label for the border text box on the QR page

qrDisabled.description: A notice that QR title retrieval is not enabled

qrFetchTitleLabel.description: A setting to fetch the title of the reference and include it in the generated QR code.
qrFetchTitleLabel.message: Include title of reference in QR code

qrFgColorInputLabel.description: The label for the foreground color text box on the QR page

qrGenerationFailed.description: The message to output when a QR code could not be generated
qrGenerationFailed.message: An error occurred while generating the QR code.

qrImageTypeLabel.description: A label for the radio selection of image save format

qrManualMessageLabel.description: The label for the manual message check box on the QR page

qrManualMessageTextLabel.description: The label for the manual message text box on the QR page

qrMessageEncoded.description: Label for message encoded in QR code

qrSave.description: Instructions on how to save QR image
qrSave.message: Click on the image to save it

qrSizeInputLabel.description: A label for the size text box on the QR page

qrTitleSuccess.description: Successful status of title retrieval for QR encoding

syncDataWipeDescription.message: Wipe all synced data and disable Sync
